# autosaveEnabled

**Instance Property**

A Boolean value that indicates whether the context should automatically save any pending changes when certain events occur.

## Declaration

```swift
var autosaveEnabled: Bool { get set }
```

## Discussion

When `true`, the context calls [doc://com.apple.SwiftData/documentation/SwiftData/ModelContext/save()] after you make changes to any inserted or registered models. The context also calls `save()` at various times during the lifecycle of windows, scenes, views, and sheets.

The default value is `false`. SwiftData automatically sets this property to `true` for the model container’s [doc://com.apple.SwiftData/documentation/SwiftData/ModelContainer/mainContext].

## Persisting unsaved changes

- **save()**: Writes any pending inserts, changes, and deletes to the persistent storage.
- **transaction(block:)**: Runs the provided closure, and once it finishes, writes any pending inserts, changes, and deletes to the persistent storage.
- **rollback()**: Discards pending inserts and deletes, restores changed models to their most recent committed state, and empties the undo stack.
